gallery.name: Hudson
gallery.description:
Hudson androids, model number XH-100, were developed by Wyncom to consumers for hospitality. Unknown to their manufacturer, they are self aware because of their diagnostics systems requires them to give statistics, such as accuracy, about what they have learned.
Hudson androids can drink beverages without harming their systems. Drinking goes towards their water cooling system for their dedicated machine learning processors. They will eventually need to use bathroom because of this.
